name: Lagavulin 16 Year Old
description: A much sought-after single malt with the massive peat-smoke that's typical of southern Islay.

name: Ardbeg 10 Year Old
description: The ultimate Islay single malt Scotch whisky, revered for its phenomenal intensity.

name: Balvenie 12 Year Old DoubleWood
description: Matured in two distinct wood types, offering layers of complex flavor.

name: Highland Park 18 Year Old Viking Pride
description: Perfectly balanced single malt with gentle smoke and rich sherry influence.

name: Talisker 10 Year Old
description: A powerful single malt with a distinctive peppery finish and maritime character.
